articles.author: Elizabeth Cohen, CNN Senior Medical Correspondent
articles.title: Full FDA approval of Pfizer's Covid-19 vaccine had only a modest impact on uptake. Here's what mattered more - CNN
articles.description: Despite hopes that full approval of Pfizer's Covid-19 vaccine would convince large numbers of vaccine-hesitant Americans to roll up their sleeves, a federal government analysis provided to CNN suggests approval was not a silver bullet.
